complaints.description: The service was not up to the mark. The representative was unhelpful, and the issue was not resolved even after multiple calls.
Had to wait a long time before someone picked up my call, and even then, the issue remained unresolved.
The agent was rude and did not listen to the full problem. I had to call back multiple times to get a solution.
Service was slow, and the representative had a lack of knowledge about the product.
The issue was partially resolved but the representative did not follow up as promised.
Incorrect charges on the bill. I was charged for services that I never received.
Late fees were added to my account incorrectly, even though I paid on time.
Overcharged for services. The bill amount was much higher than what was agreed upon.
Charged for an upgrade that I did not authorize. The billing system seems to have a glitch.
The billing statement is confusing and difficult to understand. The charges are not clearly broken down.
The website is down frequently, causing inconvenience while accessing services.
The app crashes often, especially when trying to make a payment. It's very frustrating.
Unable to log in to my account despite resetting the password multiple times.
The system is slow, and it takes too long to load pages. This has been ongoing for weeks.
Issues with the payment gateway. Transactions are often declined for no reason.
The package was delivered late, causing me to miss an important deadline.
The package was damaged upon arrival. The box was crushed, and the contents were broken.
The courier left the package outside without ringing the bell, and it was stolen.
Received the wrong package. It was meant for someone else.
The tracking information was inaccurate, and I had no idea when the package would arrive.
